document_data.mainbody:
Tyche Pink was a type of blended wine, found in the Western Heartlands, along the River Chionthar, and the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Tyche Pink owed its color to a mixture of red and white wines, both were very fragrant. This blended wine was considered to be somewhat a low-class libation and nobles of Baldurs Gate only consumed Tyche Pink as a last resort.
